description:
Position: Procurement Specialist/Buyer

Location: Los Angeles, CA, USA 90039

Key Responsibilities

  • Review purchase requisitions and determine procurement methods.
  • Identify suppliers, solicit bids, and evaluate proposals.
  • Negotiate terms and pricing for goods and services.
  • Generate and manage purchase orders, ensuring compliance with company policies.
  • Track order status and expedite deliveries as needed.
  • Resolve supplier issues related to pricing, quality, and delivery.
  • Maintain supplier relationships and conduct performance evaluations.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or related field.
  • 1-3 years of experience in purchasing or procurement.
  • Strong negotiation, communication, and data entry skills.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office, particularly Excel.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience with procurement software or ERP systems.
  • Knowledge of contract management, supply chain logistics, and inventory management.
  • Certification in procurement or supply chain management (e.g., CSCP, CPSM).
